Text.val: 20.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: 31.08.2001
Last Modified: 11.12.2001 JJ
22.08.2003 EE SCR4087 write and show history
20.05.2003 JJ SCR3194 new button handling
23.01.2003 JJ implemented new authorization/screen title concept
12.12.2002 JJ SCR2561 added fetching of CODE description to Read inits
11.12.01 JJ cleaned up comments, to do list was already taken care of
-Cancel closes screen without saving, returning to calling task
-OK saves changes and raises tab event to commit transaction
Translate using call to GB004 on event trigger
Button labels
Translation of dunning letter description trigger (User Action 2)
Call GB900 only serves to fetch PID, authorisation should be ensured
when program is called
If the old values for IDUN_DUNNLETTER and/or IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED
are past screen title should be Edit... instead of New...
New records need to be initialised, changed records may cause changes
in key fields, therefore separate tasks for new and update
raise tab event to commit
(Re)Set menu actions only on cancel
Before storing validate changes
verify is to return user to RM if there are errors

ExpSyntax.val: IF (Trim ({0,3})<>'' OR NOT (ISNULL ({0,4})),MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP106A]: Edit dunning history'),MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP106A]: New dunning history'))

Text.val: See if this stops further events
for storage purposes
Duplicate key
Non existing DULD
Invalid date
